oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ICROFS news 2/2009. Newsletter from ICROFS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rebsdorf, S.O.
Sørensen, L.S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: - CORE Organic ERA-net proposal is formulated. - Nitrogen management on large organic dairy farms. - Organic labelling systems and consumer trust. - Organic farmers may gain from Green House Gas trade. - Certified Organic Agriculture: Policy Instrument for Sustainable Development? - No effect of cropping system on the greenhouse gas N2O. - Economics, Policy and Organic Agriculture.
